lead_paragraph: Ricky Rudd will be behind the wheel of the Robert Yates Racing No. 88 Ford this week at Lowe’s Motor Speedway in Charlotte, N.C., after missing five weeks with a separated left shoulder. Rudd was injured Sept. 2 in a wreck at California Speedway. The 50-year-old Rudd, who recently started his 900th race, had never missed a race because of injury.
